response.overview: In the age of endless streaming and anonymous audiences, three college girls chase validation in front of the camera and stumble into a nightmare behind it. Drawn in by the allure of a wealthy livestream donor known only as "Chameleon747", they follow a trail of digital breadcrumbs to an abandoned parking lot. What begins as a reckless game for attention spirals into terror as an unseen predator emergesâ€”turning their feed into a stage for horror, and their viewers into complicit spectators. "STALKER" is a chilling exploration of digital voyeurism, toxic influence, and the price of online fame.
response.tagline: Three college girls chasing online clout accept a mysterious livestream challenge from an anonymous fan, but what starts as a harmless stunt in a empty parking lot spirals into a night of terror when they realize they've walked into a predator's trap.
response.title: STALKER (2025 Short)
